Translations.Text: Inna: "day ur ak nni$ ara, keçç, s tidep, ur tezmiôev, yidi, a pûebôev, d awez$i
Inna: "ma steqsa$ k $ef t$awsa, deffir ta, ur teddu yidi. Ni$ ssutre$ ak d ssmaê
Lêan, armi bbwven ar imezda$ n yiwet n temdint, ssutren asen lqut. Ugin a ten snubgten. Ufan en lêiv, qôib ad i$li. Iûeggem it. Inna: "ma teb$iv, tzemrev a ppepwaxellûev $ef waya
Inna: "Tura a nemfaôaq. Ad ak d fke$ lmaâna n wayen i$ef ur tezmirev a pûebôev, d awez$i
Lbabuô nni, n igellilen i ixedmen di yill. B$i$ a t ôée$, acku yiwen ugellid, deffir sen, itekkes yal lbabuô, s yi$il
Wanag ileméi nni, llan imawlan is d lmumnin. Nugad ad iêeppem fellasen tinufqa, tijehli
Neb$a ad asen d Irr, Mass nnsen, it yifen: win iûfan, iqeôben nezzeh aêunu

Wanag lêiv, n sin warrac igujilen n temdint. Illa ugerruj seddaw as, i nitni. Babat sen d argaz ilhan. Mass ik Ib$a, ard im$uôen, ara d ssuff$en agerruj nnsen. D aêunu s$uô Mass ik. Ur t xdime$ s lameô iw. D tagi ay d lmaâna n wayen i$ef ur tezmiôev a pûebôev
Steqsan k $ef Bu sin wacciwen. Ini: "ad awen d awi$, fellas, asmekti
S tidep, Nefka yas di tmurt, u Nsehhel as iberdan di yal cci
Iîîef yiwen n ubrid
armi sanda i$elli yiîij. Iufa i$elli $ef tala ilu$en. Iufa n $uôes agdud. Nenna: "a Bu sin wacciwen, âaqeb iten, ne$ lhu $uôsen
Inna: "win idensen a t nâaqeb, sinna, ad iu$al ar Mass is at Iâaqeb aâaqeb unekkaô
Wanag i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, akafi igerzen. Ad as Nini i isehlen si lameô nne£
Sinna, ilêa d yiwen n ubrid
armi sanda d ineqqeô yiîij. Iufa n ineqqeô ed $ef ugdud, iwumi ur Nefki ar at isdarin segs
Am akka. Ni$ ibbwev a£ d akw usali s
Sinna, idda d yiwen n ubrid
armi ibbwev ger sin iêdiden. Iufa, deffir sen, agdud qôib ur fehhmen awal
Nnan: "a Bu sin wacciwen, s tidep, Iaouo akked Maouo la ssefsaden di tmurt. A k nxelleû ma terriv ûûuô garane$ yidsen
Inna: "yif it iyi Ifka Mass iw. Efket iyi afus, ad rre$ ûûuô garawen yidsen
Awit iyi d tiqaùmtin n wuzzal alamma irgel wayen illan ger idurar". Inna: "ûuvet alamma tekker degs tmes. Awit iyi d ad smire$ fellas nnêas ifsin
D$a ur zmiren a t id zegren, ur zmiren a t id flun
Inna: "ayagi d aêunu s$uô Mass iw. Mi d tusa lemâahda n Mass iw, a t Isawi. Lemâahda n Mass iw d tidep
Assen, a ten Neoo ad ddehmen wa $ef wa. Aûuvu di lbuq, d$a a ten Nessemlil akw
A d Nessken nezzeh Loahennama, assen, i ijehliyen
wid iwumi sêurrment wallen nnsen, mgal asmekti W. Llan ur zmiren i usemêes
Day $ilen, wid ijehlen, ad rren imdanen iW, d imawlan war Nek? Ih, Nhegga Loahennama, d axxam i ijehliyen
Ini: "ad awen mle$ at igiten imexsuôen sennig wiyav
Wid iwumi iweddeô laâtab nnsen di tmeddurt n ddunit, wanag nitni nwan gerzen igi
Widak d wid i inekôen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, akked temlilit yideS. Mêan igiten nnsen. Ur ten Nwezzen, ass n tnekra
Atan uqeîîi nnsen: Loahennama, imi jehlen, u mmaâlken deg issekniyen iW, akked imazanen iW
Ma d wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, axxam nnsen d leonanat n Loennet
Degs ad wekkôen, ur ssuturen ayen nniven
Ini: "lemmer ill d lmidad, i wawalen n Mass iw, ad iqqaô yill, uqbel ad fukken wawalen n Mass iw, xas a d nawi i t icban n lmidad
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weêêan iyi d ar Öebbi nnwen, d Öebbi Yiwen. Win issaramen timlilit n Mass is, ad ixdem ayen ilhan, ur ipcarak yiwen deg waâbad n Mass is
Khiâû
Asmekti uêunu n Mass ik, i umdan iS Zakarya
mi iger, i Mass is, ti$ôi tabavnit
Inna: "a Mass iw! S tidep, ôéent laâvam iw, aqeôôu iôeq si ccib. A Mass iw! Anuju $uôeK uroin iyi isnu$ben
Nek ugade$ llzem iw, deffir i. Tameîîut iw d tiâiqeôt. Efk iyi d lfeôx s$uôeK
ad iyi iwôet, ad iwôet si twacult n Yaâqub. Err it, a Mass iw, d win iôuvan
A Zakarya, s tidep, Nbecceô ik s uqcic, ism is Yeêya. Ur Nefki, i yiwen, ism agi, uqbel is
Inna: "a Mass iw! Amek ara sâu$ aqcic, tameîîut iw d tiâiqeôt, u nek $emqe$ di tewser
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass ik: ayagi ishel fellI. Ni$ Xelqe$ k, zik, ur telliv d acemma
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi d assekni". Inna: "assekni ik, ur tepmeslayev i medden, krav wavan, ur tuvnev
Iffe$ ed ar ugdud is, si lemqam. Iweêêa yasen ad anzen ûûbeê, tameddit
A Yeêya, eîîef Tazmamt, s loehd". D ûûebyan, Nefka yas ûûwab
lmaênana akked ûûfawa, s$uône£. Ipêezzib
ibedd i imawlan is; ur illi d aqehhaô ne$ d amâaûi
Tifrat fellas asmi d ilul, asmi ara immet, asmi ara d iu$al d amuddir
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Meryem, asmi taâzel iman is, si twacult is, di tama ugmuv
Terra ssteô garas yidsen. Nuzen as d ôôuê nne£. £uôes, amzun d amdan ifuqen
Tenna: "ad iyi Ëerz Uênin, segk, ma tepêezzibev
Inna: "nek, d amersul kan n Mass im, ad am fke$ aqcic iûfan
Tenna: "amek ara sâu$ aqcic, ur iyi innul umdan, ur lli$ d tazennant
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass im: ayagi, ishel fellI. A t Nerr d assekni i medden, d aêunu s$uône£. D lameô ippuêeppmen
Tebbwi tadist; syis taâzel iman is, di tama ibaâden
Bdan p id inzikmiren ar loedra n tezdayt. Tenna: "anna$ lemmer mmute$, uqbel ayagi, ad pwappu$ akw
Issawel as d, seddaw as: "kkes a$wbel, ih, Mass im Irra i$éeô, seddaw am
Hucc, ar $uôem, loedra n tezdayt, ad am d i$li ppmeô amaynut ibwan
Eçç, ssew, ssefôeê iéôi m. Ma twalav yiwen n umdan, ini as: nek, s tidep, uéame$ i Uênin, ur pmeslaye$, assa, i umdan
Tôuê yis ar ugdud is, tebbwi t. Nnan: "a Meryem! Ni$ tusiv d, s temsalt ihejjnen
A ultmas n Haôun, ur illi baba m d argaz ucmit, ur telli imma m d tazennant
Teswâad $uôes. Nnan: "amek ara nemmeslay i ûûebyan di dduê
Inna: "nek d amdan n Öebbi. Ifka yi d Tazmamt. Irra yi d nnbi
Iôqa yi anda lli$. Iweûûa yi taéallit, u zzakat, skud mazal iyi d amuddir
Ad bedde$ i yimma. Ur iyi Irri d aqehhaô, ne$ d ccaqi
Tifrat felli asmi d lule$, asmi ara mmte$, asmi ara d u$ale$ d amuddir
D wagi ay d Âisa, mmi s n Meryem. D awal n tidep, i$ef cukken
Ur iûwib ara, i Öebbi, ad Isâu kra n mmi S. Gedha syiS! Ma Iseyya lameô, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili
Öebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw, d Mass nnwen. Ihi, âabdet eP. D wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid ijehlen, mara walin ass abarar
Ara slen, ara walin, ass ideg ara d asen $uône£! Maca, imednas, assa, di ttelfan s ûûeê
Nabi ten, $ef ass n ssixîa, mara iûaô lameô. Nitni, di l$eflan, nitni ur uminen
Ih, d Nekwni, ara Iweôten tamurt akked wayen illan fellas. £uône£ tu$alin nnsen
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Ibôahim. Ih, Neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Mi inna i baba s: "a baba! Acimi tâabdev win ur nsell, ur nepwali, ur k ip$itin s wacemma
Ih, a baba, Nek ippunefk iyi d, si tmusni, ayen ur ak neppunefk. Ihi ddu yidi, a k nhu$ ar ubrid ilhan
A baba! Ur âabbed Cciîan. Ni$ Cciîan illa d amâaûu i Uênin
A baba! Nek, ugade$ a k iwwet uâaqeb n Uênin, a ppiliv d ameddakwel n Cciîan
Inna d: "day tugiv keçç, a Ibôahim, iôebbiten iw? Ma ur tfukkev ara, war ccekk, a k ôeome$! Ïixxeô iyi tallit $wezzifen
Inna: "ili di tifrat. Ad ssutre$ i Mass iw, ad ak Isemmeê. Neppa, s tidep, Iâuzz iyi
Ad âazle$ iman iw segwen, akked wayen tepnujum, war Öebbi. Ad naâôe$ Mass iw, ahat, s unuju w, ar Mass iw, ur $webne$ ara
Mi iaâzel iman is segsen akked wayen âabden, war Öebbi, Nefka yas Isêaq akked Yaâqub. Yal yiwen, Nerra t d nnbi
Nefka yasen seg uêunu nne£. Nerna yasen ccekôan umâin, lfayeq
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Musa. Ih, neppa, illa d aâeôvi, d amazan, d nnbi
Nessawel as d, si îîeôf ayeffus n udrar. Nessqeôb it id, ad as Nmel
Nefka yas, seg uêunu nne£, gma s, Haôun, d nnbi
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Ismaâil. Ih, neppa, illa d win ippaîafen di lemâahda s, d amazan, d nnbi
Iumeô i twacult is, taéallit, zzakat. Iôuva t Mass is
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Idris. Ih, neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Nessuli t s amkan aâlayen
D wigi i I$at Öebbi, ger lambiyya, ger tarwa n Adem, ger wid i Nebbwi akked Nuê, ger tarwa n Ibôahim, akked Isôail, ger wid Nenha u Nefren. Ma $ôan asen issekniyen n Uênin, ad $lin knan, s imeîîawen
Lxwelf nnsen d asatu i iooan taéallit, ddan d ccehwiyyat. Ad magren ttelfan
Kkes ed wid isteôoâen, iumnen, xeddmen ayen ilhan. Wigi, ad kecmen Loennet, ur pwadensen s wacemma
Leonanat n Âaden i Iwaââed Uênin, i imdanen iS, di tbavnit. Lemâahda S, s tidep, a ppevôu
Ur sellen, degs, i yir awal, siwa: "tifrat"! Dinna, lqut nnsen, ûûbeê, tameddit
D tagi ay d Loennet, ara Nerr d lweôt, i wid ipêezziben, seg imdanen nne£
Ur d nepûubbu, siwa ma s lameô n Mass ik. IneS i illan zdat nne$, i illan deffir nne$, akked wayen illan garasen. Mass ik ur Iteppu
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ihi, âabed iT, ili d imezgi deg uâbad iS. Day tesnev win isâan ism iS
La iqqaô umdan: "ma mmute$, day a yi d ssuff$en d amuddir
Day ur icfa ara umdan, ar t id Nxelq, zik, ur illi d acemma
S Mass ik, ara ten Nefser, nitni akked cwaîen. Sinna, a ten Nerr ad zzin i Loahennama, $ef tgwecrar
Sinna, a d Nekkes, si yal arbaâ, wid ibe$wven nezzeh, ar Uênin
Sinna, d Nekwni, war ccekk, i Isnen sennig akw, imenza ar tmeô$iwt
Akken tellam, a pqeôbem $uôes. Akka, ar Mass ik, d aseyyi imuêeppmen
Sinna, a Nsellek wid ipêezziben. A Neoo degs, imednas, $ef tgwecrar
Mara asen $ôen issekniyen iberrzen nne£, qqaôen wid ijehlen i wid iumnen: "menyif sin irebbuyaâ di temâict akw i lemwansa
Acêal isuta i Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen, ifen ten tarkunt, ûûifa
Ini: "ad Irnu Uênin di laâmeô, i im$eôôqen, alamma walan acu i sen ippuwaââden: d aâaqeb ne$ d imir. Ad éôen anwa illan deg umkan adiran mavi, ay d bu lâaskeô uôhifen mavi
Ad Irnu Öebbi nnhaya i wid ipwanhan. Ar Mass ik, leûlaê idumen ifen akafi, asisi
Ma twalav win iugin issekniyen nne£, u inna: "tarkunt, tarwa ad iyi ppunefkent, war ccekk
Aâni issen tabavnit, ne$ iu$ lemâahda s$uô Uênin
Xaîi, a Naru ayen inna. Ad as Nessi$wzef nezzeh aâaqeb
A Newôet ay d inna, a d ias $uône£, d awêid
Xtaôen, war Öebbi, iôebbiten ar asen d iawin tazmert
Xaîi! Ad nekôen aâbad nnsen, ad asen u$alen d ixûimen
Ur twalav ara, Nuzen ed ccwaîen i ijehliyen, la ten laâjen s ljuô
Ur pêiri fellasen, la Nessalay kan leêsab nnsen
Ass ideg ara Nefser wid ipêezziben ar Uênin, d imaâôaven
a Nenheô ijehliyen, d aqwvaô, ar Loahennama
Ur sâin ccafuâa, siwa win iu$en lemâahda ar Uênin
Nnan: "Isâa Uênin, aqcic
Ni$ tebbwim d abeââuq
Segs, qôib flan igenwan, tcerreg tmurt, grurjen idurar s édiê
Gren aS mmi S, i Uênin
Ur iwjib ara, i Uênin, ad Isâu mmi S
Akken llan di tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ay d iteddun, ar Uênin, s waâbad
Ih, Iêseb iten, Issen nezzeh amvan nnsen
Akw a d asen $uôeS, ass n tnekra, yiwen yiwen
War ccekk, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Iâuzz Uênin
Nerra t kan d ushil, s tmeslayt ik, iwakken a pbeccôev, syis, wid iêezzben, u a pnedôev agdud iggernenn
Acêal isuta ay Nesqucc uqbel nnsen! Day a pmagrev yiwen degsen, ne$ a ppeslev i uswecwec nnsen
Ïh
Ur ak d Nessader ara Leqwôan iwakken a p$weblev
D asmekti kan i win ippagwaden
D tarusi s$uô Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan aâlayen
Aênin i Iâanncen $ef usgeld
IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, i illan garasen, i illan seddaw tmurt
Ma téaâvev, ihi, Neppa Iéôa sser, akked wayen iffren sennig es
Öebbi, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. IneS ismawen imxulaf
Ma tusa k id teqûiî n Musa
Mi iwala times, inna i twacult is: "qqimet dagi, nek wala$ times. Amar awen d awi$, segs, asafu, ne$ ad afe$, di tmes, nnhaya
Mi ibbwev $uôes, Ssawlen as d: "a Musa
Nek, s tidep, d Mass ik. Ekkes arkasen ik, ih, aql ak di Ïuwa, ta$zut iôqan
Nek Smenyafe$ k, sell ed i uweêêi
Nek, s tidep, d Öebbi, ur illi ôebbi siwa Nek. Ihi, âabed iyI, ééal ilmend usmekti W
Imir, s tidep, a d ias. B$i$ a t Ffre$, iwakken yal yiwen a t Nkafi $ef wayen ixdem
£uôek a k issefôe$ fellas, win ur numin ara yis, i iddan d lhawiyya s! Mulac a pnegrev
D acu p tinna deg ufus ayeffus ik, a Musa
Inna: "d taâkwazt iw, fellas tekkaye$, syis sse$laye$ d iferrawen i lmal iw. Sseqdace$ p i wayen nniven
Inna: "veggeô ip, a Musa
Iveggeô ip, tu$al d azrem, ippeênunuf
Inna: "ddem ip, ur ppagwad, ad as Nerr udem is amenzu
Eémev afus ik, s idis ik. A d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. D assekni nniven
iwakken ad ak Nessken, seg issekniyen nne£ imeqwôaêanen
Öuê ar Ferâun. Neppa, s tidep, d aqehhaô
Inna: "a Mass iw! Lli idmaren iw
Sehhel iyi lameô iw
Efsi tiyersi seg iles iw
ad fehmen awal iw
Efk iyi amâiwen di twacult iw
gma Haôun
Ssem$weô, syis, tazmert iw
Zdukkel it ar lameô iw
iwakken a K nesbuccaâ aîas
a K id nesmekti aîas
Keçç, s tidep, la $ d Tepwaliv
Inna: "tepwaqbel tuppra k, a Musa
Ni$ Nâateq ik, tikelt nniven
mi Nweêêa, i yimma k, ayen i Nweêêa
err it deg usenduq, veggeô it s asif. A t issers wasif deg uqeôqaô, a t iddem ucengu W, u d acengu is. Fki$ ak si lmaênana W, a ppeppuôebbiv zdat wallen iW

Mi telêa ultma k, tenna: "ma ad awen mle$ w ara itkelfen fellas"? Nerra k id i yimma k, ad fukken imeîîawen is, ur têezzen ara. Ten$iv amdan, Nsellek ik si le$wben. Njeôôeb ik s lfetnat. Tzed$ev kra iseggwasen ar at Madian. Sinna, tusiv d s lqwedôa, a Musa
Smenyafe$ k i iman iW
Öuêet, keçç akked gma k, s issekniyen iW, ur stehzayet $ef usmekti W
Öuêet ar Ferâun. Neppa, s tidep, d aqehhaô
Mmeslayet as s wawal amelêan, amar a d immekti, ne$ ad iagwad
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Nugad ad a$ iglez, ne$ ad ijuô
Inna: "ur ppagwadet, Nek, war ccekk, yidwen, Selle$, Pwali
Öuêet $uôes, tinem as: "nekwni d imazanen n Mass ik, seddu yidne$ At Isôail, ur ten ppâaqab ara. Aql a$ nusa k id s issekniyen n Mass ik. Tifrat i wi iddan d nnhaya
S tidep, neppuweêêa d, ar ad ippuâaqeb win inekôen, iwexxôen
Inna: "anwa T Mass nnwen, a Musa
Inna: "Mass nne$ d Win Ifkan lxelq is i yal cci, sinna, Inha
Inna: "amek tevôa d isuta timezwura
Inna: "i ten Iéôan, d Mass iw, di Tezmamt. Mass iw ur I$ellev, ur Iteppu
Win i wen irran tamurt d dduê. Iga yawen degs iberdan. Issers ed aman seg igenni. Nessuffu$ ed yissen tiyugiwin n yal ûûenf n le$ôus
Eççet, ekset lmal nnwen. Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i imawlan n ddehn
Segs, Nxelq ikwen; degs, a kwen Nerr; segs, a kwen id Nessuffe$, tikelt nniven
Ni$ Nessken as akw issekniyen nne£ inkeô, iugi
Inna: "day a$ d tusiv, s ssêur ik, a Musa, ad a$ tessuff$ev seg wakal nne
War ccekk, ad ak d nawi ssêur i t icban. Err garane$ yidek ppaâud, deg umekkan iwulmen, ur t nezgal, ur t tezgalev
Inna: "ppaâud nnwen ass n tme$ôa, a d mlilen medden, di tûebêit
Izzi Ferâun, ijmaâ ed ccbukat is, d$a iusa d
Inna yasen Musa:"a tawa$it nnwen! Ur d garet tikerkas $ef Öebbi, a kwen Isxev s uâaqeb. Ni$ ad ixseô win d igren
Mcawaôen f lameô nnsen, ffren ayen mmeslayen
Nnan: "ihi, sin agi d iseêêaren, b$an a kwen ssuff$en seg wakal nnwen, s ssêur nnsen. Ad kksen abrid nnwen amxallef
Jemâat ed ccbukat nnwen, sinna aset ed d leûfuf. Ni$ ad irbeê, assa, win iufraren
Nnan: "a Musa! A pveggôev keçç, ne$ d nekwni ara iveggôen d imezwura
Inna: "xaîi, veggôet"! Si ssêur nnsen, iwala amzun leêêun imraren akked tâakwzin nnsen
Musa, deg iman is, iêus i lxuf
Nenna: "ur ppagwad! Keçç, s tidep, sennig sen
Veggeô i illan deg ufus ik ayeffus! Ad isseblaâ ay d snulfan". Ay d snulfan, siwa ccbukat iseêêaren. Anda idda useêêar, ur irebbeê ara
£¨lin iseêêaren, knan, nnan: "numen s Mass n Haôun akked Musa

Inna: "day tumnem yiS, uqbel i wen serrêe$? Neppa, zi$, d ameqwôan nnwen. Isêefv awen ssêur. War ccekk, ad awen gezme$, avaô sya, afus sya, u a kwen ûemmôe$ af umidag n leodar n tezdayin. A ppeéôem, s tidep, anwa ay d bab uâaqeb meqqwôen, u ara idumen sennig wiyav
Nnan: "ur k nesmenyaf, d awez$i, i wayen i $ d iusan ubeggen, akw i Win i $ Ixelqen. Seyyi i k ihwan a pseyyiv. Aseyyi k, d aseyyi $ef tmeddurt n ddunit agi kan
Ih, numen s Mass nne$, iwakken ad a$ Isemmeê tuccva nne$, akked wayen n ssêur i têeppmev fellane$. Pifxiô Öebbi d Imezgi
Ih, Loahennama i win iusan ar Mass is, d abe$wvi. Ur ipmeppat degs, ur d ippidir
Win i iusan $uôeS d lmumen u ixdem ayen ilhan, widak ad ilin deg imukan aâlayen mavi
leonanat n Âaden, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, ad wekkôen din. Ayagi, d akafi i win zeddigen
Ni$ Nweêêa i Musa: "ôuê, deg iv, akked imdanen iW. Egg asen abrid akiwan, di yill. Ur ppagwad a kwen in vefôen, ur ppiwêic
Ferâun, s iâsekôiwen is, vefôen ten. Isseblaâ ten yill, içça ten
Itlef Ferâun agdud is, ur inhi
A yAt Isôail! Ni$ Nsellek ikwen seg ucangu nnwen. Nefka yawen ppaâud, ar loiha tayeffus n udrar. Nessers awen d lmenna, ifeôôuoen
Eççet si lmakla ilhan, i s ikwen N$at. Ur zegret tilas fellas, mulac a kwen immager urrif iW. Win immuger urrif iW, ni$ igrareb
U Nek, s tidep, Psemmiêe$ i win isteôoâen, iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, d$a ipwanha
Acu i k i$eûben seg ugdud ik, a Musa
Inna: "zgan deffir i. £awle$ d $ureK, a Mass iw, iwakken a Pôaviv
Inna: "ih, ni$ Njeôôeb agdud ik, deffir ek. Itelf iten Usamiri

Iu$al ed Musa s agdud is, s zzâaf d wumri. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Day ur awen Ifka ara, Mass nnwen, lemâahda lâali? Day tâaîîel fellawen lemâahda? Ne$ day teb$am a kwen immager urrif n Mass nnwen? Tzeglem ppaâud iw
Nnan: "ur nezgil ppaâud ik, s leb$i nne$. Maca, nbubb tiâakkwmin n ôôêuê n ugdud, d$a nveggeô iten. Akken i iveggeô Usamiri
Issuffe$ asen d aâejmi, d ameslux isrugmuten. Nnan: "wagi d ôebbi nnwen u d ôebbi n Musa. Ippu
Day ur walan ara, ur asen d ippara awal, ur izmir a ten ivuôô, ne$ a ten infaâ
Ni$ Haôun inna yasen, uqbel: "a yagdud iw! Teppuhewwlem kan, yis. Mass nnwen, s tidep, d Aênin. Ddut yidi, vefôet lameô iw
Nnan: "ur tnepfukku akaber is, d awez$i, alamma iu$al ed Musa $uône
Inna: "a Haôun! D acu i k iîîfen, mi ten twalav nnetlafen
Day ur teddiv ara yidi? Day tugiv lameô iw
Inna: "a mmi s n yimma! Ur iyi ppaîîaf si tamart iw, ne$ seg uqeôôu w. Nek, s tideps, ugade$ ad iyi d tiniv: tessemfaôaqev At Isôail, ur tu$ev awal iw
Inna: "d acu t leqsed ik a Usamiri
Inna: "wala$ ayen ur walan. Ddme$ d tummeét n lateô umazan, veggôe$ p. Akka ay êusse$ deg iman iw

Inna: "ôuê ihi, a ppevôu yidek di tmeddurt a ppeqqaôev: ur iyi pnalet! U, s tidep, $uôek ppaâud ik ur tezmirev a t tzeglev. Muqel ôebbi ik, u$uô mazal teqqimev, ard a t nesseô$, a t ssebruzzaâ ar yill, wakali
Mass nnwen, siwa Öebbi. Ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Tamusni S tjemmel yal cci
Akka i k Nêekku, seg isallen n zik. Ni$ Nefka yak d, s$uône£, asmekti
Win i s iwexxôen, ad iâabbi taâkkwemt, ass n tnekra
Ad wekkôen dinna. Ay dir ip fellasen ppaâbga, ass n tnekra
Ass ideg ara d ûuven di lbuq, a d Nefser ibe$wviyen, zgezwen assen
Ad swecwicen wa i wa: "mraw kan i teqqimem
Nekwni, Nif akw akken Nessen, ayen d qqaôen, mi sen inna yiwen umxallef degsen: "teqqimem kan ibwass
Steqsayen k $ef idurar. Ini: "a ten Issebruzzaâ Mass iw, d iwzan
A ten Irr d aza$aô ibuôen
Ur tepwaliv degs i iâawjen, ne$ i izzren
Assen, ad vefôen aberraê, war zzrug. Ad irs ûûut zdat Uênin, a ppeslev kan i uswecwec
Assen, ur ten tenfaâ ccafuâa, siwa i win Iooa Uênin, u Iôuva t $ef wawal
Issen i illan zdat sen, i illan deffir sen. Ur illi sanda ara T issinen
Ad îîinzen wudmawen i Umuddir n lebda. Ara ixesôen d win ibubben ddens
Win ixeddmen ayen ilhan, u neppa iumen, ur ippagwad ddens, ne$ aqhaô
Akka, Nessers it id, d Leqwôan s taâôabt. Nenewwel ed, degs, aâeggen, amar ad êezben, u a ten id ias usmekti
D Ameqwôan Öebbi, Agellid, Tidep. Ur pêiri, di t$uôi, uqbel ma ifukk uweêêi s, $uôek. Ini: "a Mass iw! Ernu yi di tmusni
Ni$ Nâahed, zik, Adem. Ippu, ur Nufi $uôes laâzem
Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis i iugin
Nenna: "a Adem, wagi, s tidep, d acengu k, akked tmeîîut ik. £urwat a kwen id issuffe$, si Loennet, a p$weblem
Ih, keçç, degs, ur teplaéev, ur tâarruv
S tidep, keçç, degs, ur tepfadev, ur k iîîuôôu yiîij
I$wa t Cciîan, inna: "a Adem, ad ak ssekne$ ttejôa uwekkeô, akw n tgelda n lebda
Eççan segs, d$a walan iman nnsen âaryan, bdan la tessôen iman nnsen, s iferrawen n Loennet. Adem iaâûa Mass is, idda di le$wlav
Sinna, Ifren it Mass is, Issuref as, Inha t
Inna: "ûûubet segs akw, wa d acengu n wa. Ma tusa kwen id nnhaya, s$uôI, win iddan d nnhaya iW, ur ipputellef, ur i$webbel
Win iooan asmekti W, tameddurt is d tucmip. Ass n tnekra, a t Nefser d ader$al
A d yini: "a Mass iw! Acimi iyi Tfesrev d ader$al, ni$ lli$ pwali
A d Yini: "akken i k id iusan ssekniyen nne£, teppuv iten, akken ara tepwappuv, assa
Akka ay Nepqeîîi win izegren tilas, ur numin s issekniyen n Mass is. U, s tidep, aâaqeb n laxeôt iwâaô kteô, u ad idum kteô
Day ur ten inha ara wacêal isuta i Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen? La leêêun $ef tnezdu$in nnsen. Deg wayagi, s tidep, d issekniyen i imawlan n ddehn
Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal, s$uô Mass ik, akked lajel ipwassnen, yili, war ccekk, iûaô uâaqeb
Ihi, bibb ayen d qqaôen, sbuccaâ s ccekôan Mass ik, uqbel ad inqeô yiîij, uqbel ad i$li, deg iv. Anez di levôuf n wass, amar fellak aôavi
Ur ppara allen ik ar wayen i Nefka i kra n twaculin nnsen. D ajeooig n tmeddurt di ddunit, iwakken a ten Njeôôeb yis. A$iti n Mass ik yif it, u ad idum kteô
Ameô taéallit i twacult ik, êerz ip. Ur ak Nessutur ôôeéq, d Nekwni ara k Iôeéqen. Laâquba d aêezzeb
Nnan: "a lemmer i $ d iusi s ussekni s$uô Mass is"! Day ur ten id iusa ara ubeggen, deg wayen illan di tewôeqtin timezwura
Lemmer iten Nesqucc s uqeîîi, uqbel neppa, a d inin, war ccekk: "a Mass nne$! Acimi ur a$ d Tunzev ara amazan? A neddu d issekniyen iK, uqbel a nendell u a neppuqeîîi
Ini: "akw, la nepgani. Ihi gganit. A ppissinem anwi i iddan d ubrid ilhan, anwi i ipwanhan
